name: Haywire (Iodine)
description:
You are a crazy inventor, hellbent on creating evil robots to assert control over the 4 main industries that supply you.

Manage your resources and keep your bot production running smoothly in your bid to take over the world!

---------------------------------------------

UPDATE: Due to a lack of time to properly playtest the game's mechanics, we've decided to upload a "balanced" version post-release for anyone who wants to try it. The game is VERY hard without it. It can be downloaded here: https://www.dropbox.com/s/po1ns9c0ruod78p/Haywire_Balanced.zip?dl=0
